description: Stable, fast and energy-efficient web-browser. Based on Chromium web-browser with spy and bloatware removed and fixed. I extensively tested Iridium with WebRTC audio/video and ublock origin. Can accurately track loaded URLs and when started from the command line.
summary: Great Chromium fork engineered with the focus on privacy and security

description: This browser feels faster than Chrome with the AdBlock extension!
Open Source Browser basierend auf Chromium. Schnell und energieeffizient. Keine Datenübermittlung an google.
summary: Chrome kompatibler Browser mit Fokus auf Datenschutz
